name: Anicca Digital Solutions
overview:
Anicca Digital Solutions is a web development and online marketing agency; specializing in database driven websites that are search engine friendly and that can be completely modified by the client.

Their services include:

  • consultancy
  • training
  • web design and development
  • online marketing.

Their websites are built using unique website and content management system, called Reflex. This is built using Flex and a multitude of other technologies; resulting in static xhtml pages which are both search engine friendly and accessible.

Reflex includes the following features:-

Content management system (CMS)

  • Ability to add and edit pages and tags
  • Document & file management
  • Multilingual pages and CSS
  • Clients/portfolio plug-in
  • News & RSS plug-in
  • Blogs & RSS plug-in
  • Forum plug-in
  • Optimised content (SEO)

Website management system (WMS)

  • Menu manager
  • Layout manager
  • Customer registration form
  • Product & service database
  • Management of customer or product information
  • Data import & export
  • Email plug-in
  • Shopping cart/eccommerce
  • Site status
  • Site analysis & statistics
